data.title: Homer Central School District
data.meta_description: This is the homepage for the Homer Central School District
data.text:
We are excited to use Parent Square to communicate with you at the school, and in your child’s classrooms and groups!

Parent Square provides a simple and safe way for everyone associated with school to connect. When fully implemented, with Parent Square you’ll be able to:

Receive all school and classroom communication via email,

text or app

View and download photos

View the school and classroom calendar and RSVP for events

Easily sign up to volunteer and/or bring items

You will soon receive an invitation email or text to join Parent Square. Please click the link to activate your account. It takes less than a minute. You can use Parent Square on any device. You can download the free mobile app for Android or iOS and you can also use it from a computer at: www.parentsquare.com.
